Class ApplianceItemDAO

java.lang.Object
homeappliance.ApplianceItemDAO
public class ApplianceItemDAO extends Object
ApplianceItemDAO is a Data Access Object (DAO) class that provides methods for managing ApplianceItem records in an SQLite database. This class includes operations for adding, retrieving, updating, and deleting ApplianceItem objects as well as sorting and querying records by specific attributes.
Version:
5/1/2025
Author:
Amrit Singh

  • Method Details

    • addApplianceItem

      public boolean addApplianceItem(ApplianceItem item)
      This method adds a new ApplianceItem to the database.
      Parameters:
      item - - the ApplianceItem object to be added
      Returns:
      true if the addition is successful, false otherwise

    • findAllApplianceItems

      public ArrayList<ApplianceItem> findAllApplianceItems()
      Reads and retrieves all ApplianceItem records from the database.
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of ApplianceItem objects

    • findApplianceItem

      public ApplianceItem findApplianceItem(int id)
      Reads and retrieves an ApplianceItem from the database by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - - the ID of the ApplianceItem to retrieve
      Returns:
      the ApplianceItem object if found, otherwise null

    • updateApplianceItem

      public boolean updateApplianceItem(ApplianceItem item)
      Updates an existing ApplianceItem in the database which is retrieved by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      item - - the ApplianceItem object containing updated details
      Returns:
      true if the update is successful, false otherwise

    • deleteApplianceItem

      public boolean deleteApplianceItem(int id)
      Deletes an ApplianceItem from the database by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - - the ID of the ApplianceItem to delete
      Returns:
      true if the deletion is successful, false otherwise

    • itemsSortedByWarrantyYears

      public ArrayList<ApplianceItem> itemsSortedByWarrantyYears(boolean ascending)
      Retrieves ApplianceItem records sorted by warranty years in either ascending or descending order.
      Parameters:
      ascending - true to sort in ascending order, false for descending order
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of sorted ApplianceItem objects
